oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Railroad workers' strike ends, 1955 May 09
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of picketers holding the Nashville Banner newspaper's morning extra announcing the settlement of the 57-day-old strike of Louisville & Nashville and Nashville Chattanooga & Saint Louis railway workers. They were picketing at Eleventh Avenue and McGavock Street, Nashville, Tennessee, at the entrance to the downtown railroad yards. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3.25 x 4.25 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Banner; Louisville and Nashville Railroad Company; Nashville, Chattanooga, and St. Louis Railway
